pma:database.name: prova1
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `account` ( `idAccount` int(11) NOT NULL, `nomeAccount` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `piattaforma` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `dataCreazione` date NOT NULL, `followerTotal` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idAccount`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `posts` ( `idPost` int(11) NOT NULL, `idAccount` int(11) NOT NULL, `like` int(11) NOT NULL, `commenti` int(11) NOT NULL, `condivisioni` int(11) NOT NULL, `data` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idPost`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
